MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the EH26 postcode area of Penicuik. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 4.18pm. Repairs are taking longer than as further fault finding investigations are required and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 10.30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 7.10pm on Wednesday 13 January 2021.
